description: metal barrel covered in a light tan pigment; on top of barrel is printed "White City Puzzle Savings Bank"; a knob on top of the barrel unscrews the cover; barrel has wood graining on sides
inscription:
Inscription 

on side, stamped into metal: [NICOL & CO]
on side, stamped into metal: [PAT. OCT. 23, 94]
object_name: "White City Trick Bank (or Puzzle Bank)" still bank
title: "White City Trick Bank (or Puzzle Bank)" still bank
